item.title: R.E.M. - Losing My Religion - Key of Am - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Losing My Religion performed by R.E.M.. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D, Dm, Em, F, G.

item.title: R.E.M. - The Lion Sleeps Tonight - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song The Lion Sleeps Tonight performed by R.E.M.. Chords used in the song: C, D, G.
